name: Deeper Daddy
description:
Deeper Daddy The cave is falling! / ¡La cueva esta cayendo!

[ENG] 

The cave is falling and although you don't have any arms you are going to save them! Rescue the eggs from being crushed by the falling rocks while saving yourself in the process, no one said being a Dad was easy.

[ESP] 

¡La cueva se esta cayendo y aunque no tengas brazos los vas a salvar! Rescata los huevos de ser aplastados por las rocas que caen mientras te salvas a ti mismo en el proceso, nadie dijo que ser papá fuera fácil.

Controls / Controles

[ENG]

  • WASD/arrow keys - Move
  • K - Pick up egg
  • L - Throw egg
  • spacebar - Jump

[ESP] 

  • WASD/flechas - Movimiento
  • K - Agarrar huevo
  • L - Lanzar huevo
  • spacebar - Saltar

Music by: https://quietgecko.itch.io

Ludum Dare page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/deeper-daddy
